Articles.Content:
Grounded Space Flight introduces the interplanetary drive ring for the GSF-2 Wyvern.

The drive ring is design to be launched with a Wyvern and takes a bit of skill to actually get into orbit, but is a ssto system. Once in orbit you can leave it up there to re-dock a Wyvern to. Each half of the drive ring can be controlled independently. Just undock the halves from the Wyvern and then reattach to each other and leave in orbit.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

You may want to reconfigure action keys to your preference. I will post a video on getting it into orbit later on after I've perfected the technique

Those who want to give it a try heres the download: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0BxW31U5ogVX-djVySzNmcHVSdk0/edit?usp=sharing

The craft file for the GSF-2 Wyvern without the ring can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53618-GSF-2-Wyvern
